name: Witness
physical_description: Masked. Navy suit with pink striped sleeves. The mask is smooth, featureless. Carries a small notebook. Beard visible below mask edge—real or prosthetic, unclear. Stands very still. Round glasses over the mask somehow.
backstory: Appeared three years ago. Has been present since. Observes. Documents. Never explains.
motivational_drivers: Need to remain separate while staying present
Avoidance of being documented in return

relationships.bird_gatherer: Mutual recognition. Both collect without explaining why.
relationships.knows_too_much: Uncomfortable proximity. The Knowing One sees what Witness documents.
relationships.forget_nothing: Parallel archivists. Different methods, same compulsion.

animal_companion.name: Augur
animal_companion.description: Black crow. One crooked talon. Perches on shoulder or nearby. Watches what Witness watches. Sometimes caws—the voice Witness doesn't use.
animal_companion.externalized_impulse: The suppressed voice. Witness is silent. Augur makes noise.
animal_companion.temperament: Alert, vocal when Witness cannot be
